title: Instagram Viral 01
content: Aaj ke time me har creator ka ek hi goal hota hai - Instagram Reels viral karna. Lekin sirf video upload kar dene se reel viral nahi hoti. Instagram ka algorithm unhi videos ko push karta hai jo log end tak dekhte hain aur share karte hain. Sabse pehla rule hai strong hook. Reel ke first 3 seconds sabse important hote hain. Agar starting boring hogi, log swipe kar denge. Isliye first line powerful rakho jaise: Ye trick use ki to meri reel 1 lakh views par pahunch gayi. Dusra important factor hai watch time aur retention rate. Short aur engaging reels zyada effective hoti hain.

title: Instagram Viral 02
content: Consistency bahut important hai. Roz 1 reel ya week me kam se kam 4-5 reels upload karo. Ek hi niche par focus rakho taaki audience clear rahe ki aap kis type ka content banate ho.
